Description_lang: Reduces all damage you take by $s1% for $d.While Ardent Defender is active, the next attack that would otherwise kill you will instead bring you to $s2% of your maximum health.
AuraDescription_lang: Damage taken reduced by $w1%.The next attack that would otherwise kill you will instead bring you to $w2% of your maximum health.$?a469439[Healing taken increased by $w4%.][]
